text: The Bayer designation Pi Ursae Minoris (π UMi, π Ursae Minoris) is shared by two star systems, π1 Ursae Minoris and π2 Ursae Minoris, in the constellation Ursa Minor. They are separated by 0.64° on the sky. * π1 Ursae Minoris * π2 Ursae Minoris Category:Ursa Minor (constellation) Ursae Minoris, Pi
title: Pi Ursae Minoris
